name: Zombie Solitaire 2, Chapter 1
description:
Your escape from the zombies continues - now with even more of a bite! Play your cards right and escape the zombies' hunger for human brains once again.

After the first zombie epidemic - triggered by a contaminated tofu burger - many survivors found shelter on an island. But now they're in for a nasty surprise. When leftovers of the contaminated tofu regrettably end up on the island during the survivors' party, another zombie invasion begins. Is there still a last chance of survival?

Now your nail-biting escape back to the mainland starts. Enjoy many challenging solitaire matches and entertaining mini games as you find your way back through a land full of swaying undead. Use your brain - as long as you still have one! Prepare to master some challenging duels and do the right thing in intriguing multiple choice adventures. Eliminate those blood-thirsty villains in gripping Match 3 duels with a deadly sugar shock, because type Z diabetes is the bane of any zombie.

Before every duel make sure you stock up on sugary power-ups and usual wildcards and don't forget the time or you'll miss the flight to safety! Zombie Solitaire is chock full of zombie-tastic humour and fun card game action with plenty of pop culture references to characters or games.

Features:
·         Sequel to the popular solitaire adventure
·         Entertaining mini games of various genres
·         Optimized and more challenging solitaire levels
·         100+ exciting levels
·         Numerous power-ups and useful wildcards
·         Challenging Match 3 duels
·         Multiple-choice adventures in which your decisions influence how the story develops 

…and lots of zombies, of course!


Minimum system requirements:

  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
